title: Perform Random Act of Kindness
content: Buy a coffee for the next person in line or leave a positive note for a co-worker. Focus on low-effort, high-impact kindness.

title: Check Firewall Logs for Anomalies
content: Review all egress traffic from the staging environment between 02:00 UTC and 05:00 UTC. Flag any unexpected port usage. Urgent priority.

title: Review Q4 Marketing Budget Allocation
content: Verify spending limit for Google Ads versus LinkedIn campaigns. Shift 15% from social to content creation. Must be approved by finance by EOD.

title: Buy New Running Shoes (Urgent)
content: Need to replace old pair. Check local sports store for the latest Brooks Ghost or Hoka Clifton models. Don't forget new running socks.

title: Research Micro-frontends for Next Project
content: Investigate using Module Federation in Webpack 5. Look up case studies from major companies like Spotify or IKEA on successful implementation patterns.

title: Practice Japanese Vocab: N3 verbs
content: Spend 30 minutes on flashcards for ~verbs. Review conjugations for past tense and potential form. Focus on the 'iru' group.

title: Fix Broken Coffee Maker Drip
content: The carafe gasket is leaking. Order a replacement seal kit from Amazon or check if the local appliance store has a compatible part in stock.

title: Review Personal Budget for November
content: Check subscriptions. Cancel the streaming service that hasn't been used in 3 months. Allocate extra funds to the travel savings goal.

title: Draft New Feature RFC: Time Travel Debugger
content: Outline the technical requirements for recording state changes in Redux/Vuex. Define the API shape for accessing the recorded history.

title: Call Landlord about Leak in Kitchen
content: The pipe under the sink has a slow drip. Need to schedule a maintenance visit before it causes damage. Call between 9 AM and 5 PM.

title: Organize Digital Photos from Trip
content: Create a new folder structure: /Vacation/Paris/Day_1. Delete duplicates and blurry photos. Upload the final gallery to the shared drive.

title: Read Article: 'The Future of Serverless'
content: Review the latest trends in FaaS and Edge computing. Write a 3-point summary on its impact on deployment costs for the team meeting.

title: Write Thank You Notes to Clients
content: Draft personalized emails for clients A, B, and C who signed contracts this month. Send them a small gift package via the courier service.

title: Install New Graphics Card Drivers
content: Update the Nvidia drivers to the latest stable version (546.65). Check settings in all major games to ensure optimal performance.

title: Bake Sourdough Starter Feed Day
content: Feed the starter 'Bertha' with 50g flour and 50g water. Discard half of the remaining volume. Set a reminder for the next feeding in 12 hours.

title: Create Dashboard for Backend Metrics
content: Set up Prometheus and Grafana on the monitoring server. Configure alerts for 95th percentile latency exceeding 500ms for API calls.

title: Clean Refrigerator and Pantry
content: Throw out expired condiments and forgotten leftovers. Wipe down shelves with an antibacterial cleaner. Organize dry goods by expiration date.

title: Finalize Q4 Sales Pitch Deck
content: Review slides 5 and 9 for correct market statistics. Add a closing slide with tiered pricing options. Send to the CEO for final sign-off.

title: Learn Three New Guitar Chords
content: Practice the Dsus4, Am7, and E7 chords. Integrate them into a simple 4-bar progression. Use the metronome at 90 BPM.

title: Set Up DNS Records for New Domain
content: Add A record pointing to the main server IP. Configure MX records for Google Workspace email delivery. Check propagation using a public DNS checker.
